name: Factree
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam

Plant forests and repopulate the planet. Take over a dystopian abandoned city. Each tile has obstacles to overcome through different means, and you will need to plan your forest ecosystems out like factories, where different buildings and units will help to strengthen your biome and destroy the surrounding devastated landscape.

Gameplay notes: Fly Traps remove any rusted cars or dumpsters around them, while the Wrecking Ball removes taller buildings. Use Bees to convert dirt tiles into fertile grass. Some trees have to be placed on water instead. Try to cover the entire map in greenery!

Any comments or feedback is greatly appreciated! More game updates are on the way!

TEAM BEE

- Mykyta Shvets
- Colin Witow, M.Sc.
- Rome Daniel
- Rene Dufour-Contreras

Music: https://www.bensound.com
